original_text: As a penalty for the sin they have committed, they must bring to the Lord a female lamb or goat from the flock as a sin offering; and the priest shall make atonement for them for their sin.
korean_text: 그 잘못으로 말미암아 여호와께 속죄제를 드리되 양 떼의 암컷 어린 양이나 염소를 끌어다가 속죄제를 드릴 것이요 제사장은 그의 허물을 위하여 속죄할지니라

sentences.original_text: As a penalty for the sin they have committed
they must bring to the Lord a female lamb
or goat from the flock as a sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 양 떼 중에서 암염소를 속죄 제물로 삼아야 한다

sentences.original_text: and the priest shall make atonement for them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그들을 위해 속죄할 것이다
